page.title: 12Industry _ Pollution
page.content: The pollution in this area is very dangerous to bathers who swim in the Solway Firth.The radio active waste gets washed up onto the shores of the Solway Firth.People around this area don't eat shell fish out of the sea because the radio active waste gets into their bodies.In 1984 bathers in Siddick were sitting in a rock pool for a short period and when they got out they were covered in blisters .Sellafield is very dangerous because of the radio active waste.The worst hit area is between Maryport and Workington.In Flimby some becks that are in the woods are polluted by people who go for pick-nicks who throw things in.One beck near the woods is full of paint and sewerage.
